item.title: DED allows for the licensing of eight additional business activities
item.description:
Source: DED. Bushahab. Dubai’s Department of Economic Development (DED) has expanded its list of permissible business activities, increasing the total to 2,133. This decision stems from regular feedback gathered from various industry sectors regarding local market needs and the balance of supply and demand. The goal is to simplify business operations and offer essential resources for growth. The new additions encompass several specialized activities. These include assembling industrial robots, providing tax consultancy services, printing secure documents, manufacturing scanners, collecting and transporting hazardous waste, offering health consultancy, brokering financing deals, and developing and managing applications for social media...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/ded-allows-for-the-licensing-of-eight-additional-business-activities/
